name: cynthia-dash
description: Offering a GUI dashboard experience for CynthiaCMS users, but as a plugin.

scripts.build: npm run build:ts && npm run build:css
scripts.start: echo "This plugin should be ran from inside Cynthia!"
scripts.dev: concurrently "postcss --watch src/tailwind.css -o generated/css/style.css" "npx tsc --watch" "nodemon --watch ./dist/* -q dist/index.js -- serve"

author: MLC Bloeiman
